text: 14:20 Matyu 15:11; Rom 14:14-15; 1 Korin 8:9; 8:13; Taitus 1:15Nɨ daghemra nɨghnɨgh, tuavir kamɨn God amizir arazibagh asɨghasɨghan markɨ. Guizbangɨra, dagheba bar, ada dera. Eghtɨ nɨ daghetam amɨtɨ, bizir kam gumazir igharazim damightɨ, an arazir kuram damigh irɨghtɨ, kamaghɨn nɨ arazir kuram gami.
